content: I mean, I guess -- I mean, the other the other thing, when we were kind of talking the last time about the margin and rate hikes, and we were talking about, let's say, 8 basis points of benefit to the margin per 25 basis point rate hike, that was -- it also kind of assumed a little more, I guess, methodical type of rate hike, where you're getting 25 basis points at a time.
